tags: None
review: Dr Harish is a thorough professional. Very glad we went here to consult for knee pain. Acknowledged, explained and put us at ease with his expertise. Highly recommended!

tags: None
review: Great treatment by doctor. He was very friendly and polite with patient. He analyses the root cause very wel and starts the treatment with medication instead of directly jumping to the conclusion of surgery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: First thing I liked about the doctor is the way he explained my health issue and the procedure of the surgery and the time required for rehabilitation, he was very clear and he made it sound very simple. I felt I came to the right doctor and that gave me full confidence in the doctor which is very much required when you are going for a surgery big or small. Most of the communication was on WhatsApp which saved me a lot of time. I already started recommending the doctor for few of my friends. I am happy with my ACL reconstruction.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: On January 8th 2022,I had left knee injury.After diagnosis it resulted in ACL tear and I was recommended to Hosmat hospital.My wife has did lot of research about doctors and decided to consult Dr.Harish G Puranik sir.Believe my words he is such a expert and friendly ,kind..he is more than his  reviews .prior to consulting him others doctors prescribed immediate  surgery .But After consulting him he told me to recover from internal injury and go for surgery.On February 11th 2022 he did my surgery.Surgery went for 1 hr 30 mins where he did ACL reconstruction and partial meniscus repair.I still remember during surgery time he is so cool and showed me what happened and how he is repairing it ,Believe me he was humming songs during that time .Overall surgery went successful and I have started my recovery process.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Checking method of problem of the patient .
Explanation of the problem.
No prescription of unnecessary tablets.    



In reception they taking more time.
For any updation of refer by doctor... They didn't ask about anything. Themselves filled the format.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited for ACL reconstruction of right knee
doctor will answer the queries of patients with good explanation , caring for patients,and if any clarification required for patients that will be given by phone/whats up . Highly recommended doctor for those who are need of good treatment and care.
Thank you very much sir for giving me good treatment

review:
Dr Puranik makes you feel very comfortable. He listens attentively. He investigated my issue in detail, was very helpful. I was very impressed that he shared this mobile number for any emergency. Also did call to explain my blood report and next steps. You automatically feel healed when you have such amazing experience with Doctors. 

Thank you Dr Puranik. :)

review: **** ******* I visited for my wife's right upper back pain. Doctor was friendly, did a thorough clinical examination and suggested way ahead. Good part is no extra and unnecessary test were advised, and suggested to monitor recovery.
